title: Boston Heritage Hotel Near Freedom Trail with Renowned Restaurant & Two Bars
description:
Get lost in Boston's illustrious history at this charming heritage hotel boasting cosy vintage-style interiors. Savour culinary delights at Parker's Restaurant, the birthplace of the Boston Cream Pie, or sip on a wine or cocktail at elegant Parker's Bar or The Last Hurrah, a classic American bar.

Venture out to explore the Freedom Trail, Faneuil Hall Marketplace, or the nearby Theatre District before retreating to the onsite fitness centre or the comfort of your elegantly appointed room or suite.
offer_address: 60 School Street, Boston, Massachusetts 02108, United States

title: Heritage Boston Escape with Award-Winning Celebrity Chef Restaurant
description: Discover a hidden slice of Parisienne glamour at The Eliot Hotel in Boston's Back Bay area, a member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts Lifestyle Collection and currently ranked among the city's top hotels by Tripadvisor. This heritage property is set within Commonwealth Avenue, one of the most beautiful boulevards in America, with Boston’s famous art galleries, Newbury Street shopping precinct and Copley Place close by. During your stay, be sure to dine in at UNI, an exquisite Japanese eatery rated the #1 Restaurant in Boston by Boston Magazine and headed by celebrity chef Ken Oringer.
offer_address: 370 Commonwealth Avenue, Boston, MA 02215, United States

title: Massachusetts Victorian Manor Stay in the Heart of the Berkshires
description:
An intimate escape from everyday life beckons at The Constance, a secret slice of historic luxury in Lenox, Massachusetts. Enjoy a fairytale stay in this thoughtfully restored Victorian-style mansion, surrounded by lush greenery and manicured lawns, all in the heart of the beautiful Berkshires. Ideally nestled one block from downtown Lenox, The Rookwood Inn sits within easy reach of local walking tracks, cultural experiences, world-class dining and gilded-age historic homes and museums.

Named for the famed pottery company in Cincinnati, Ohio, The Constance prides itself on creating a peaceful, homely environment with the same sense of artfulness and care. The property and its stunning garden are reserved just for guests: spend days relaxing under the pergola, cosying up by the fireplace or indulging in organic, locally grown gourmet provisions on the porch. You’ll find yourself at home at The Rookwood Inn all year round.
offer_address: 11 Old Stockbridge Rd, Lenox, MA 01240, United States

vendor_name: Omni Boston Hotel at the Seaport
title: Sophisticated Boston Seaport Escape with Rooftop Pool, Six Onsite Restaurants & Luxe Spa
description:
Delve into the heart of Boston's vibrant Seaport District from the comfort of your elegant city oasis, perfectly positioned within easy reach of the city's top cultural attractions. Boasting stylish and well-appointed rooms, relax and unwind while soaking up unrivalled city and harbour vistas from the floor-to-ceiling windows.

Indulge in unique dining experiences across the hotel's six restaurants and bars which offer a range of Mediterranean-American fare, Capri-style pizzas or French speciality coffee and sip on global cocktails at the lively sports-themed bar. For relaxation, retreat to the tranquil spa or take a dip in the sun-soaked rooftop pool.
location_description: Omni Boston Hotel at the Seaport
offer_address: 450 Summer Street, Boston, Massachusetts 02210, United States

title: Glamorous Boston Langham Retreat in the Heart of the City with Italian Restaurant & Chic Bar
description: Bostonian elegance of the highest degree awaits at the lavish five-star Langham Hotel, Boston - perfectly positioned in the heart of the city. This historic hotel, once the Federal Reserve Bank, is a stone's throw from the iconic Freedom Trail, the city's sparkling harbour and the bustling shops of Newbury Street. Dine on Italian family-style dishes in the grand hall of Grana, or relax with a New England concoction in hand at The Fed cocktail bar.
